website_summaries.verdict: It's quite basic but inexpensive and serves its purpose for those who either don't need much space or prefer a smaller backpack.
pros: Straps are comfortably padded, and easily double as a carrying handle
PVC material feels reasonably durable for such a good price
cons: Not as spacious as others on our list
Some customers wish it came in more trim color choices

customer_reviews.title: Not ready for prime time. Definitely a Fail.
customer_reviews.text: So this pack was for my sons newly implemented “clear backpack” policy. School started Aug 26 and the first tear came within 2 weeks and slowly tearing one strap off completely, the piping around the top has slowly torn about 12” around the top and now after 2 weeks of “be careful with it”, the other strap has succumbed to the weight of 2 spiral binders and the occasional wadded up homework assignment. Not sure if this is the norm with this plastic material, but I’m estimating I need 4 of these per year at this rate.
customer_reviews.author: Damazon Prime

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and transparent
customer_reviews.text: We have a precocious six year old who likes to sneak things to school, so this is the perfect backpack for him! It is sturdy enough for him to carry around while being not so gentle with it. No more notes from the teacher that he has brought an unapproved item to school. Definitely a winner!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Slough

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this backpack....NICE!!!! Very good quality product and very good size. Most, if not all San Antonio schools are going clear at school and all sporting events. I am glad they are looking to keep our kids safe. I also asked the company if they can send it quicker and they did exactly that. I really appreciate that. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... backpack is made very cheap and it doesn’t seem like it would last long
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is made very cheap and it doesn’t seem like it would last long. I tried returning it and just kept getting tossed back and forth between amazon customer service and the seller. Now I’m stuck with this item and will not be purchasing from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: I actually used this for school
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much abused this backpack and it held up pretty well. it was only like $7 when I bought it and it ripped a couple months after heavy usage, but I got so many compliments and it held all of my things.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Shon

customer_reviews.title: Unexpectedly good
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these backpacks for my teenage twins and I'm surprised at their durability. I was disappointed initially when I found out that the school required clear backpacks because we all know plastic doesn't last very long, especially when you're toting heavy books around a lot. But they've had these backpacks for almost 4 months now and they're still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: pashwill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack for concerts and trips
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this backpack in 2015 to use during a 3-day music festival - we needed a clear, comfortable backpack, and this was the perfect choice. It has held up really well - we use it on all of our trips, picnics, hiking, etc. We even used it during our Disney World trip. We usually add a small pouch for items that we want to hide. It is very roomy, so holds a lot of items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I get so many compliments on it and it so unique. I got it in pink, and the only complaint I have is just that: the straps are VERY, VERY pink. Imagine a bright, hot pink. I still adore it, I had only imagined a more toned down color on the straps. Overall I love this product and am even considering buying one in black!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had took pictures before I threw them away but I bought two of theses for two 6 graders. They fell apart in a month and a half. I was extremely unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ellzey

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compliments...
customer_reviews.text: I had to have a see-thru backpack, but I wanted something that was cute. I also wanted something that would hold up. It is made of a nice plastic. Not too stiff but stiff enough so it doesn't flop. Quality zippers, handle, and strap. Best part is I have gotten many, many compliments about how cute it is! Even from guys... LOL
customer_reviews.author: SeeksTheTruth101

customer_reviews.title: Works great, durable so far
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Holds plenty. My only gripe is it's not compatible with any hydration reservoir, so I had to leave the top a bit unzipped, and I zip-tied the reservoir top to the top strap. Other than that, this full sized clear backpack was essential to keeping us stocked with water, first aid, snacks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Whodat

customer_reviews.title: Worked!
customer_reviews.text: As described, I purchased this backpack to use as a work bag due to security. Worked like a charm. Although I didn’t have to use it for too long so I don’t know the full durability.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy_Khunies

customer_reviews.title: Junk backpack. First day of school and the straps ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk backpack. First day of school and the straps already ripping off. My son only had a couple of folders in it. So nothing heavy. So mad.
customer_reviews.author: missMoTX

customer_reviews.title: It’s not flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I expected a flimsy backpack but I was shocked when it came. The bag is way better quality that I thought I would get. It feels sturdy and it seems like it will hold up for the school year even with a little abuse it seems to be holding together well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had this bag less than a year,
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bag less than a year, I use it 4-5 times a week and it is already starting to break apart
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: My go-to clear work bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag for work. Have to replace twice a year because the seams rip easily but I like the style. Have purchased about 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This bag lasted about a year. I bought it ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag lasted about a year. I bought it for work, since it was required to have clear bags. After I left it in the car during the Summer for 2 days the bag was unable to be used anymore. The plastic molded into a weird shape. If you purchase this bag make sure you don't leave it in the heat for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Cute backpack
customer_reviews.text: Cute my daughter loved it! But it’s easy to tear.
customer_reviews.author: Quita Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not wort it
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed two weeks into my kid going to school the straps broke.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Eagleton

customer_reviews.title: My kiddos love
customer_reviews.text: Love the color options for these clear backpacks and they seem to be more durable than the ones we purchased in store last year.
customer_reviews.author: Yogi Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart fast, like less than a week before the straps broke loose.
customer_reviews.author: Darren M

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Less than a week old and stitching is coming undone. Top loop is ripped. P.o.s. don't do it
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for a concert and it held up very well! I stuffed it full most days and it always held. I really like the pop of teal as well. Will be using at future events.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Better than the walmart one
customer_reviews.text: Company recently required all employee use clear bags. Most employees purchased the cheapest one avail from walmart. This one is holding up better than the cheaper one. Seams are staying together. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bob w

customer_reviews.title: Good Clear Bag
customer_reviews.text: So far, good. I’m already expecting to buy more just feel any type of bag like this won’t last. School district says this is used as a safety measure.
customer_reviews.author: mamasledge

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Didn’t last.
customer_reviews.text: Dissaointed. I have been using this for less than a year and it’s completely torn apart, the edge is ripped open completely. I am not hard on it. I carry it to work and home. Going to have to buy another one now. But it was a fine back pack until now.
customer_reviews.author: eli teller

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the coral in mine. I am using it for an artist support project. And it is wonderful. I will be buying it again!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Basulto

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Backpack straps broke and torn up after only 2 weeks with light use
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty plastic and strong zippers as expected from Eastsport brand has great quality. Will keep stuff dry in rain.
customer_reviews.author: J Kulas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: durable and fits criteria for being allowed in most public events with restrictions.
customer_reviews.author: AmyD

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Has held up four months of daily use holding heavy books and everything else my child puts in it! That's a win for me!
customer_reviews.author: RealHousewifeChicago08

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice and durable but has already ripped along the seams in two places
customer_reviews.author: Lovedove82

customer_reviews.title: Looks nothing like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The color is very dull and not pretty at all
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Johnston

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The strap on top broke after the first day of use.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Bear

customer_reviews.title: Not good for too many books
customer_reviews.text: Hs kids had to wear these this yr. My son's is already coming apart
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Brown

customer_reviews.title: I bought these at the beginning of the school year ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at the beginning of the school year honestly with low expectations. I am pleasantly surprised at how well they have held up.
customer_reviews.author: marcy frye

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. I looked it over closely and everything is stitched well. It will hold up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T.

customer_reviews.title: Used one year and using it again
customer_reviews.text: MY four year old son used this for pre-k and it held up great. Used it again for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Cara and Bryan

customer_reviews.title: I'd Order This Again!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. And sturdy. Great price. Plenty of room for the two pair of very thick, cushiony sneakers I wear at work. The front 'pocket' section is an added bonus; it easily holds the pens, lip balm, glasses, etc. Especially if you work in an industry that requires you to carry a clear bag, this one is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: T. K. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Dont spend your money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag for my son. We begin to use this bag last week Monday 8/27 and today Tuesday 9/4 the handle is tearing. These bags should be sold at Dollar Tree so you are already prepared for failure. Dont spend your money
customer_reviews.author: Sherel Golden

customer_reviews.title: Clear bag for work use
customer_reviews.text: The bag did start to tear where the straps are attached, but this was after several years of use and a good deal of weight carried in the bag. A good buy for the money, would probably last a lot longer if you are only using to carry less then 10-15 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: so far so good! beats having a PLAIN clear backpack
customer_reviews.text: so far so good! beats having a PLAIN clear backpack, will wait to see how dirty the white gets eheheh. but overall my 1st grader loves it!
customer_reviews.author: KM1

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Held up well during trip to spring ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Held up well during trip to spring training where it was used daily. Expect to use it many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald E. Skaare

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this school bag I got for my daughter, it was super cute! Unfortunately, she started school beginning of August and now its towards the end of September and it's broken.. The plastic tore away from the seem and its unusable! Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Watch the straps!
customer_reviews.text: Strap began to split after using just a few days on the first week of school.
customer_reviews.author: sheba5

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids with sticky fingers
customer_reviews.text: No more stealing with this backpack! My daughter was turning into a clepto and once we got this bag, things stopped going missing at home and at school.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.-V.

customer_reviews.title: Comes extremely handy!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend for concerts, amusement parks, sports venues. Used it many times. Security always appreciate these clear bags!
customer_reviews.author: Janusse L

customer_reviews.title: Not for highschool.
customer_reviews.text: It was good for a while, but it didn’t last very long at all. It didn’t even last 2 months, sadly. It’s not meant for heavy books of a high school student. The handle strap tore off, then it ripped in the back at the top at the seam, and once a strap came off, I knew it was time for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: Just what I thought it would look like.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son as a Christmas gift because he wanted one for school. It looks OK just hope it last for a least until the end of this school year.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself aggravation and money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Within 2 months they busted (I ordered 2 for my teens) BOTH are currently being held together with duct tape until new ones get here from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Ivie Medrano-Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Product tore easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my children. Within two months both had torn from multiple seems. I would not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great use for grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson needed a clear backpack for school and I am very happy with this one. Sturdy He loves it cause it's trimmed in blue to match his shoes and not just clear all over
customer_reviews.author: lagirl

customer_reviews.title: Lasting
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. I have left this bag in hot car multiple times and it's still working.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I must have one of the to carry items to work at the airport. This bag has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: David Causey

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted for 2 1/2 months. Bought for my grandson to use for school. Started coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Esther C. Benavidez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this bag in a stadium that only allows clear bags in. Convenient, great choice and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Angela L.

customer_reviews.title: Needs sturdier straps/stitching
customer_reviews.text: One of the straps broke not long after we purchased it. As this backpack was perfect for school, we were very disappointed that the strap broke so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag! It's roomier than the last one I had!

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag for DisneyWorld. Gets you by airport security faster and Disney security faster.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed!
customer_reviews.text: Be aware ... cheaply made and does not last. Straps snapped off (poor stitching) after light use.

customer_reviews.title: Just average
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in late August and now it's December and this bag looks like it's on its last leg. The shoulder straps have unsewn and now there are holes on both sides of the upper part of the backpack.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good full-sized backpack. I used this one for work and school. Super durable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my bag!! Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I love mine!! I have to have a clear bag for work. This bag truly holds up. I've washed it twice. Gentle cycle cold water looks brand new!! Don't dry in dryer. Anyone who purchas this beg will definitely be happy.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and it passed the schools policy on clear backpacks

customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect size! I use it for work and it fits a 3" 3 ring binder plus my Bose sound speaker, and Other items. It's durable.

customer_reviews.text: Just as described! We bought the peachy is highlight orange! 🙂

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for a little over a year

product_meta.title: Eastsport Backpack, Clear/Black
product_meta.description: Color:Clear/BlackThis backpack has two large compartments that offer ample space, internal organization to meet your everyday needs, and padded adjustable straps for comfort. The polyester backpack is small enough for a child to carry and big enough for an adult. These SUPER POPULAR backpacks are great essentials for school & life.
feature_bullets: Adjustable padded shoulder straps for carrying comfort
Large main entry; Large front pocket with zipper closure and interior organization
Limited Lifetime Guarantee; Dimensions: 17.5" x 12.5" x 5.5"
Top Webbing Loop for Hangability; Easy Glide Zippers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars413 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
